ingredients: 4 cups pitted sour cherries, 1   +   1/2 cups white sugar, 4 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1   +   1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 cup old-fashioned oats, 1 cup brown sugar,   +   1/2 cup butter,   +   1/2 cup shortening
nutrition: Total Fat 26g 33%, Saturated Fat 11g 54%, Cholesterol 31mg 10%, Sodium 90mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 92g 34%, Dietary Fiber 3g 11%, Total Sugars 62g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 8mg 39%, Calcium 41mg 3%, Iron 2mg 12%, Potassium 228mg 5%
